sections.title: List Your Accomplishments
sections.instruction: Write down things you've accomplished, big or small. Include challenges you've overcome, skills you've learned, or goals you've achieved.
sections.placeholder: Examples: Graduated high school, learned to cook, helped a friend through a tough time, got through a difficult period...

sections.title: Create Encouraging Phrases
sections.instruction: Write encouraging phrases that feel true and supportive. These should be realistic and compassionate.
sections.placeholder: Examples: 'I'm learning and growing every day', 'I deserve kindness, especially from myself', 'I'm doing the best I can with what I have'...

sections.title: Save Kind Messages
sections.instruction: Write down kind things others have said about you, compliments you've received, or supportive messages you want to remember.
sections.placeholder: Include compliments, thank you notes, positive feedback, or encouraging words from friends, family, teachers, or colleagues...

sections.title: Collect Good Memories
sections.instruction: Write about positive memories, moments when you felt proud, happy, or successful. These are your emotional anchors for tough times.
sections.placeholder: Describe specific moments: times you felt proud, happy memories with loved ones, moments of success or joy...

sections.title: Choose Your Daily Practice
sections.instruction: Pick one encouraging phrase or affirmation from your toolkit to practice daily. Choose something that feels authentic and supportive.
sections.placeholder: Write the specific phrase you want to practice daily...

sections.title: Practice Method
sections.instruction: How will you practice your daily phrase? Choose a method that works for your lifestyle.
sections.placeholder: Examples: Say it in the mirror each morning, write it in a journal, set phone reminders, read it before bed...
